title: ISic000405. I.Sicily inscription 000405
body:
1Neratius Palmatus v(ir) [c(larissimus) cons(ularis)]
2etiam frontem scaenae O[---]

1NERATIUSPALMATUSV[.....]
2ETIAMFRONTEMSCAENAEO[---]

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of CIL

translation

commentary

Suggested to commemorate the decoration of the frons scenae of the Syracuse theatre at the expense of the consularis Neratius Palmatus.
